meanings.definition: Marked by alternating squares of different colors.
meanings.sent1: The chequered blanket had red and blue squares.
meanings.sent2: The kitchen floor was chequered with black and white tiles.
meanings.sent3: The chequered shirt made him look like a walking chessboard.
meanings.sent4: Her chequered past included both triumphs and failures.
meanings.sent5: The chequered flag signaled the end of the race.

meanings.definition: Having a pattern of alternating light and dark squares.
meanings.sent1: The chequered scarf kept her warm in the chilly weather.
meanings.sent2: The old house had a chequered floor that creaked with every step.
meanings.sent3: The chequered curtains cast interesting shadows in the room.
meanings.sent4: His chequered reputation in the town led to mixed opinions about him.
meanings.sent5: The chequered path through the forest was both enchanting and mysterious.

meanings.definition: Consisting of a variety of elements or experiences.
meanings.sent1: Her chequered career included stints in different industries.
meanings.sent2: The chequered life of the artist inspired many of his paintings.
meanings.sent3: The chequered menu offered a mix of traditional and exotic dishes.
meanings.sent4: His chequered personality made him unpredictable to his friends.
meanings.sent5: The chequered journey of the protagonist was filled with unexpected twists.
